about_the_game:
Subsequence is set in an underground research facility, a burning elevator shaft, a flooded supply tunnel, a toilet or in space. It is in the underground laboratories that, by coincidence, the main heroine Vicky gets stuck. Things go badly and Vicky will have to fight for her life.



Players will experience moments of tension, but at the same time everything will be spiced with a careful dose of humor.



And most importantly, always have fun!



FEATURES

  • Explore the colorful world of the underground research facility ranging from laboratories to the burning elevator shaft and spacious practically designed interiors of a spaceship to Vicky's cozy home where a cute animal marks its territory
  • Solve logical puzzles and don't go through the laser beam, it would cut you in half
  • Find and use items because they can be found and used
  • Have deep Conversations with no conversation options
  • Discover hidden Collectable items to unlock…
  • Easily control the entire game with just the keys WASDE or a gamepad
  • Enjoy the carefully dosed humor

content_descriptors.notes: There are dead bodies throughout the underground facility, visible blood and scene where laser in the laboratory hits the scientist body which explodes.

detailed_description:
Subsequence is set in an underground research facility, a burning elevator shaft, a flooded supply tunnel, a toilet or in space. It is in the underground laboratories that, by coincidence, the main heroine Vicky gets stuck. Things go badly and Vicky will have to fight for her life.



Players will experience moments of tension, but at the same time everything will be spiced with a careful dose of humor.



And most importantly, always have fun!



FEATURES

  • Solve logical puzzles and don't go through the laser beam, it would cut you in half

  • Have deep Conversations with no conversation options
  • Discover hidden Collectable items to unlock…
  • Easily control the entire game with just the keys WASDE or a gamepad

name: Subsequence

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100T or AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 2GB or AMD Radeon HD 7770 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3570K or AMD Ryzen 3 1300x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 4GB or AMD Radeon R9 280X 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 23 GB available space

short_description: Subsequence is a linear single player story driven 3D adventure game about overcoming obstacles, solving logical puzzles and exploration of the world.
supported_languages:
English*, Czech*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
